title: [Question] USED WRONG PICTURE AS PROFILE PICTURE IN PESU APP HOW TO CHANGE IT
content: I accidently used the wrong picture as my profile picture in the PESU app and im not able to remove it please help

comments.body: you would get that photo on your id card so fix it asap ask office ppl about that

![gif](giphy|Fh9jhYLDLo87u)

Can't wait to see what you put on your ID

Bro if you find a solution please let me know even i  messed up 
Not only the photo but also the parents information section
i accidentally messed up my moms salary and added another 0ðŸ˜­hopefully they wont care
Same man I keep receiving emails from them to upload a new photo as the previous one is wrong but there is no option to edit
I received an email today from PESU. They told me to send the correct picture and my SRN and that they would upload it
I received an email today from PESU. They told me to send the correct picture and my SRN and that they would upload it
Bro you are a saviour you deserve a biryani from my side
Did you mailed them or something
